website_summaries.verdict: This inspection camera from UNIOJO is an affordable option that will get the job done, especially if you'd rather not use your smartphone as a companion video display.
cons: Please note that this model is water resistant, and that its screen, handle, and joints are not waterproof

customer_reviews.title: Real nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: This tool has been real cool to use in the shop The only problem is that there was no hanger to hang off the hood But it came with the case real nice so far.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Checking drains
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something to look inside drains and other inaccessible places, it does what I need for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As good or Better than More Expensive
customer_reviews.text: As good or better than the older, more expensive pistol-shaped device I stupidly smashed in my cylinder head looking for TDC. It’s smaller, easier to move around and comes with a number of tools. The most useful tool is a mirror. Unfortunately the mirror is round and when angled only reflects a narrow image. Making an oblong replacement with hard stainless wire and an acrylic 1st surface mirror was an easy task but 1 star deducted for design flaw. FYI Lesson: When looking for TDC use a clip to prevent the camera snake from sliding into the cylinder chamber when you let go to turn the engine over.
customer_reviews.author: BFK

customer_reviews.title: Can make out pic.
customer_reviews.text: Hard to see the picture is always at a 45 degree angle. Sent it back for refund.
customer_reviews.author: Steven A. Frahm

customer_reviews.title: Color inspecton
customer_reviews.text: I thought when it mentioned color I thought color. It was a little bit more than black and white. The brightness has 6 setting of brightness...1 low setting 6 isn't so bright.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Nice picture
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used the scope a few times and it has helped me with what I needed to do great little scope
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Inspection camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera from my nephew who does electrical work so that he could see inside the walls and he said it works absolutely wonderful so he was very very happy with it so I gave it a five and Jeremy said he'd recommend it to anyone
customer_reviews.author: cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Did its job determining that valves struck the pistons in my engine.
customer_reviews.author: D. McNulty

customer_reviews.title: Lacking picture quality
customer_reviews.text: The light is not quite bright enough when used in confined spaces (which is most often where needed) and the low picture quality makes it difficult to see detail such as etched part numbers or reading labels in hard to reach places.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Smerdon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tool!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent support tool! Used it to diagnose & identify an internal engine issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Inspection
customer_reviews.text: Used for register inspection and right area for new house. Proved my builder was mediocre
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money on this product
customer_reviews.text: Not a good picture Not easy to move camera around Used to look inside spark plugs On engine Picture not clear
customer_reviews.author: David Todd

customer_reviews.title: Read all reviews first
customer_reviews.text: The camera end is to flimsy for the price I thought it would have been better
customer_reviews.author: William Muirhead

customer_reviews.title: Good inspection camera for the money
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised how good the video quality is. I used it inside and outside with good results. My husband can use it when working on cars too. It's easy to see in places that are hard to reach. Very useful tool.
customer_reviews.author: Buzz

customer_reviews.title: great scope for the money
customer_reviews.text: can't beat this scope for the money-really good picture,head is flexible enough and good light-works very well.
customer_reviews.author: harold boehm

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera
customer_reviews.text: Camera works great nice picture easy to see things that you can’t see behind walls or inside door frames
customer_reviews.author: johnny owens

product_meta.title: Inspection Camera, UNIOJO Digital Borescope 2.4 inch Color LCD Screen Endoscope Camera with 8MM Camera Diameter IP67 Waterproof Semi-Rigid Snake Tube Camera, Tool Box (Red)
feature_bullets: 【Stable and easier】- No needs to be connected with your phone via wifi, makes it easier to detect, diagnose, and solve inspection problems.
【Dust and water-resistant】- Before out of the factory, all the detectors have gone through waterproof tests, manufactured and tested to IP67 waterproof standard.
【Every Pixel, Clear and True】- 8 levels of adjustable LED light on camera head that greatly helps to improve image brightness in real-time monitoring.
【Viewing in Different Angles】- 2.31" color LCD monitor for detailed images plus 180° image rotation feature. Four monitoring mode：Normal/ Mirror/ Normal Upside Down / Mirror Upside Down.
【Lightweight Compact Design】- Allows for easy visual inspection of hard-to-reach areas. Professional carry case for protecting the products, easier to carry with.
